HeroPart1: I'm Danijel, I build Front-End websites using

About.name: Danijel Maksić
About.p1: I'm a self-taught Front-End web developer. I dedicate myself to building interactive and responsive web applications, with strong emphasis on user experience.
About.p2: I learned of programming as a teenager, and tried studying it on my own, Java specifically. However, because of my poor knowledge of English at the time, I didn't go far. Years later, I heard of Front-End web development, which combined my interests for computers and visual design.
About.p3: During the last three years I studied web development on my own, using every resource on the web I could find: documentations, forums, blogs, coding challenges, Youtube, courses and recently AI models.
